WITH d1 AS (SELECT m.user_cal AS recommend_cal, sum(food_cal) OVER (PARTITION BY r.user_id,trunc(do_date)) AS total_diet_cal, --total_cal sum(food_carbo) OVER (PARTITION BY r.user_id,trunc(do_date)) AS total_carbo, --total_carbohydrate sum(food_protein) OVER (PARTITION BY r.user_id,trunc(do_date)) AS total_protein, --total_protein sum(food_provi) OVER (PARTITION BY r.user_id,trunc(do_date)) AS total_provi, --total_fat trunc(do_date) AS do_date, r.user_id AS user_id FROM record r JOIN member m ON r.user_id = m.user_id JOIN dietrecord dr ON r.record_id = dr.record_id JOIN food f ON dr.food_id = f.food_id WHERE r.user_id = #{userId} AND r.deleted = 'N' ORDER BY r.record_id DESC), d2 AS (SELECT DISTINCT * FROM d1), n1 AS (SELECT DISTINCT * FROM nutriratio nr WHERE user_id = #{userId}), n2 AS (SELECT d2.*, n1.carbo, n1.protein, n1.province, (carbo + protein + province) AS total_ratio FROM d2 JOIN n1 ON d2.user_id = n1.user_id), n3 AS (SELECT n2.*, recommend_cal * carbo / total_ratio / 4.0 AS recommend_carbo, recommend_cal * protein / total_ratio / 4.0 AS recommend_protein, recommend_cal * province / total_ratio / 9.0 AS recommend_provi FROM n2), s1 AS (SELECT DISTINCT r.user_id, sum(sr.sport_time) OVER (PARTITION BY r.user_id,trunc(do_date)) AS total_sport_time, sum(sr.sport_cal) OVER (PARTITION BY r.user_id,trunc(do_date)) AS total_sport_cal FROM sport s JOIN sportrecord sr ON s.sport_id = sr.sport_id JOIN record r ON sr.record_id = r.record_id)
SELECT DISTINCT * FROM n3 JOIN s1 ON n3.user_id = s1.user_id AND trunc(do_date) = to_date(#{doDate})
, ra as (
select #{userId} as user_id, sum(recommend_cal) as recommend_cal, sum(total_diet_cal) as total_diet_cal, sum(total_carbo) as total_carbo, sum(total_protein) as total_protein, sum(total_provi) as total_provi, sum(total_sport_time) as total_sport_time, sum(total_sport_cal) as total_sport_cal, sum(recommend_carbo) as recommend_carbo, sum(recommend_protein) as recommend_protein, sum(recommend_provi) as recommend_provi, #{item.startDate} as start_date, #{item.endDate} as end_date from n3 join s1 on n3.user_id = s1.user_id and trunc(do_date) BETWEEN to_date(#{item.startDate}) AND to_date(#{item.endDate})
) select * from ra order by end_date
